EmailTemplate.subject: Registration for summer availability and CRB documents needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Further to my email dated {!Job_Application__c.00NC0000005ESh2}, I am writing to you in order to request scanned copies of the documents that we need in order to process your enhanced CRB check. It is very important that you send these documents as soon as possible as your role with us is dependant on a satisfactory CRB.
In order to apply for your CRB, please follow these instructions. Please note that you do not need to enter a password.
Visit www.carecheck.co.uk Click on the Applicant tab Please read all the notes and instructions Click on Click here to continue Click on Criminal Records Bureau (CRB) Application Form Click on Start a New Application Enter the Organisation Reference: evolutionrecruitment Enter your personal information to apply for the CRB check.
Please submit your documents for verification on the below form. Please go to http://carecheck.arrangementcms.co.uk/index.php?node=ID-Rules for information on which documents can be accepted. We also request that you submit your dietary requirements and any medical information (such as allergies) that we need to know about, so that we can cater for you during training and during your role on The Challenge.
Please click on the link below to submit your scanned documents and any information that we need to know in order meet your medical and dietary needs while you are with us.
If you already have an enhanced CRB, we will accept it if the document is dated 1 September 2011 or later. Please submit a scanned copy through the online form.
http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3b1353e7938ac86&q1={!Contact.Id}&q2={!Job_Application__c.Id}
If, after repeated attempts, you are not able to upload your documents, please email them to crb@the-challenge.org
WORK DATES I have noticed that you have not yet told us which dates you will be available for in the summer.
There are a variety of dates available for you to work in this role. Please click on the link below to select the dates that you will be available http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3b1350f0a6dc7af&q1={!Job_Application__c.Id}
If you cannot access either of the links above for any reason, please call me on the number below.
We look forward to seeing you again at training.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.OwnerEmail}
WWW.THE-CHALLENGE.ORG /thechallengeNETWORK
